text: The 2017–18 season was Milton Keynes Dons' 14th season in their existence, and their second consecutive season in League One, the third tier of English football. Along with competing in League One, the club also competed in the FA Cup, EFL Cup and EFL Trophy. The season covers the period from 1 July 2017 to 30 June 2018. ==Competitions== ===League One=== Final table {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=20 style="background:#FFFFFF;
